tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Ambika is a fantastic oral physician 
My husband was detected with oral cancer and had undergone a major surgery. Our very good friend recommended to go to her to her as he had a great experience with her treatment. 
During my visit, Dr. Ambika  took the time to thoroughly explain each procedure and patiently answered all of our questions. Her expertise and professionalism were evident in every aspect of my treatment. Not only did she address our immediate  concerns with precision and care, but she also provided valuable advice on maintaining oral health for the long term.I can confidently say that Dr. Ambika has earned my trust and respect. I would highly recommend her to anyone seeking quality dental care and other issues in a welcoming environment. Thank you, Dr. Ambika , for your dedication to excellence and for making my experience truly exceptional!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
First of all I say Many Thanks to Ambika Ma'am. I am staying at Mira road & Believe me I was suffered some chronic burning sensation & fungal infection, tooth paining issue. Even sometime inside cheeks have some rashes. I was very scared about this symptoms and went to visit at local doctor who is BHMS. At first time when we meet BHMS doctor He said that you have OSMF & need to take care & required weekly base B12 Injection is necessary. I started his medicine & took only 1 injection on same day. After 3-4 days passed still no improvement then I visited to BDS Doctor at locally & He said you don't have any OSMF symptoms.
He examined all things and Said You have suffering HSV virus & He prescribed 1 Month Medication. I was completed his course but still after 1 month my mouth burning & other symptoms was same. Again After 1 month medication I have meet him, He said need to be done full mouth X ray for better examination. I did it, & I am surprised When we meet again to BDS doctor with X ray Report. He replied that I am Sorry to say & apologies that You don't have HSV virus but nothing to worry. I asked him that earlier you was too confident and was said its HSV Virus symptoms & Now 1 month Passed and I have completed your one month medication course. Now you said it's not HSV then what is it ? BDS doctor again confused and said it might be asymptomatic reason & no any medicine in science also. If no any improvement in next 10 days then will do biopsy for testing. At that movement I literally depressed because I don't know need to be consult with which doctor ???? I feel that I should be consult with MBBS/MD doctor & I took the appointment. He asked me some few question that Do you have you any tobacco habit Or any other../ said Yes but it's not too much. He replied that might be its some serious infection in mouth But not sure. Let's take 10 days medicine & then will check. I was started his medicine as well but no improvement & conclusion on this. One day somehow I come to know that Oral and Maxillofacial doctor is best for oral related issues. I searched on web & found Dr. Ambika Tiwari Ma'am. The clinic location at Chembur which is far from Mira road but I took her appointment & visited her clinic.
Believe me, I had feel too much relax when I meet to Ambika Ma'am. The reason is that she examine my mouth & listen my all queries very calmly and said you don't need to take tension & She offered me to take one glass of water because at that period i was in tense. She calmly & confidently said Due to fungal infection that white lesion are appeared on your tongue & due to toothless space that jaw pressure has created at one side & the inside of the cheek is accidentally bitten by some other tooth Due to this reason such injury happened in inside cheeks area. So Need to fixed tooth on that place on priority. I was immediately get it done & tooth fixed work done by Dr. Ashish Tiwari Sir. He given nice treatment & fixed my tooth perfectly.
I really thankful to Dr. Ambika Ma'am & Dr. Ashish Sir ! Very humble & nice human being. They nicely explained the root cause of issues & not prescribed unnecessary medicine.
Best Treatment & Best Place !
Request to everyone those have Dental/Oral related issues Kindly visit to Dr. Ambika Tiwari Ma'am clinic once. This is best place where you will get accurate treatment & solution.
May god give them good health and prosperity! Thanks to God , have such wonderful and skilled doctors are available who always provide right treatment & diagnose the case accurately !üôèüèª

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Ambika Arora Tewari is a beacon for oral Cancer patients who are lost in darkness.  She is Munnabhai MBBS but with a genuine degree unlike in the film. She too gives you hope and lots of relief like Munna in the film. She is everything a doctor should be. Compassionate, and Caring and attentive to the patients phobias and apprehension in facing such a huge life crisis. God give her more strength to bring more smiles in all her patients lived.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Dr. Ambika is an excellent diagnostician and an ace in her field ! *** ********* ** ************ when it comes to oral pathology and concerns related to disease within the oral
Cavity. She is warm and compassionate apart from being an excellent doctor. Highly recommended :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr. Ambika was extremely calm and friendly during my appointment, providing thorough explanations of my health issues. Throughout the treatment process, she offered reassuring support, which was especially helpful as I was feeling anxious. After treatment result were good.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am from Bihar and went to many doctors in Bihar for my ulcer and burning pain in mouth. Even biopsy was done and they said it could be oral cancer. I read about Dr Ambika mam and took her appointment in mumbai. She carefully heard me, saw me and gave me treatment and I stayed in mumbai for a month and today I can say i now no complains . My burning sensation is gone, no ulcer  and I am completely fine .I am so thankful that she helped me. I would request all those who are not able to get any relief for their problems please visit Dr Ambika she is truly an expert in her field. Thank you mam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I wanted to express my sincere appreciation for the exceptional dental treatment I received under your care. Your professionalism, attention to detail, and compassionate approach made the entire experience comfortable and reassuring. Thank you for your dedication to oral health and for providing such excellent service. I am truly grateful.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Surgical treatment for oral submucous fibrosis,
review: Visited Dr AMBIKA for osmf treatment my mouth opening hardly 2 fingers and had an ulcer which was not going for more than 2 weeks, dr she had a look than she explained me soo nicely everything the way she explained you I felt she really has a good experience she knows what she is doing and and without any biopsy she told me I don‚Äôt have cancer but I m in very high risk she gave me totally different medicines not like other doctors whom I meet before and she gave me supplier contact number to buy mouth opening machine.so really thank you dr for clearing all my doubts god bless you

tags: None
review: Had referred a relative ... Thought it to be cancer but did not know who can guide well... Had read a lot about Dr. Ambika so came here with my relative.. She removed all our fear and we realised Dentistry is no longer just for teeth... Specialist  like her field are very few and should be more known to everyone.. We realised we don't have such doctors in our area and will definitely see to it that more people know about this speciality .. Thank you Dr. Ambika for a country in which abnormal thing is seen as cancer doctors like you are very much needed... Excellent service... Excellent place !

tags: None
review: I was referred to show a specialist for a stuff on my gums but did not know any good doctor.. It was a problem since 6 years and wanted to get it treated ..saw so many reviews so had to come here all the way to Mumba... Courteous staff and very polite doctors ... Dr. Ambika greeted me with patience and heard me completely after seeing my lesion immediately told me what it was and suggested me all the treatment options ..she believes in giving  conservative treatment approach and I really found her frank.. The treatment worked for me and now am really happy to have read about her and come all the way here.. Very very much recommended..

tags: None
review: I was having immense pain in front of my ears but did not know whom to show.. Had gone to ear specialist but it didn't solve my problem... Later a friend recommended Dr. Ambika's name that she is one of those specialist who can diagnose such ailments well. Meeting with her itself calmed me a lot ,she explained me exactly what I was suffering from and few appointments with her got me relief. Her approach was perfect and precise and will recommend her to all my known people. ***** **** *** *** continue spreading the smiles

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor Ambika is very supportive and helpful. My mom age 72 was having some problem in internal side of mouth and internal skin was turning black and my mom was having burning sensation and other complaints but doctor Ambika adviced really well and medicine she prescribed was helpful. After 3 months of medication my mom is feeling much better. Dr. Ambika also addresses queries on phone and WA whenever time permits she explains the situation and procedure nicely to patients

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor was very friendly and she was very good at diagnosing the disease.  She explained the cause of the disease and the curing process in a very simple and straightforward way. Moreover the doctor was available on Sundays which was very convenient to us.

tags: None
review: Dr. Ambika is one of those who is very polite,friendly and very hardworking doctor who is very passionate about her field Oral medicine .. I was tensed about a lesion in my mouth and couldn't get any logical answers from previous doctors ..had heard a lot about her so came here.. Must say the search ended .. She explained it in details and I found it very logical too. A highly recommended oral medicine specialist .. Although very few in our city but she is definitely commended !

tags: None
review: **** ******* * **** **** ******** ****** ** ** ********* ******** She took the time to explain every procedure she was doing. She is very supportive and thorough professional in explaining the process. She is the best dentist ever had and but obvious naturally lovely personality.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Was having white lesions in my tongue. It kept on coming and going and it started seriously bothering me. There were few docs who suspected it could be oral cancer. After I visited she explained me in detail about the cause and the medications. Fortunately it got cured and haven‚Äôt occurred since the last 7-8 months. 

A big thanks and would highly recommend her for any oral/ dental problems. 

Cheers/ souvik

tags: None
review: Had problem with opening my mouth wide , had heard about Dr. Ambika that she specializes in these joint problems.. On the first day itself she was so confident in understanding my problem and immediately helped me get it better . I was asked to get braces done and few crowns as my bite was faulty but I trusted her and yes it worked... I surely recommend her to all ..great expertise and dedication to her work!

tags: None
review: Before meeting Dr.Ambika I never knew what does an oral physician mean, but now I know for stuff a general dentist might not be aware of and not many speciality dentist would know ..it is an oral physician who knows it well!! Had gone for treatment if burning mouth and what a relief ...took few changes in my diet and medications and its hardly there now.. Super happy having met you doctor :)

tags: None
review: Ambika is different than your regular doctor , she patiently listens to your problems and understands your problem very well. She is friendly and has helped me recover from TMJ disorder at earliest. Further she is specialist in TMJ disorders and has devised solutions to aid faster recover. I would recommend Ambika for any treatment regarding TMJ disorders and other dental issue.

tags: None
review: Highly commended...amazing clinic n staff..Dr.Ambika come across a very busy professional but once u meet her you will know why her field is so challenging but she goes thru it effortlessly...I had a history of severe pain some said it atypical and I went thru yes of medication..I was referred to her by my friend and yes it worked...mybpain has reduced greatly and I can feel the difference how a specialist in this field can matter with exact diagnosis..thank u so much mam

tags: None
review: I met Dr.Ambika thru a reference.. She is a master in treating Oro facial pain...I had few lesions n a recurring pain in my mouth since a long time....with her expertise she treated each n every prob of mine with a lot of care..very professional at her work n a good human being! Keep up the good work

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I had consulted Dr.Ambika for my nagging Jaw pain. She examined my problem and explain the current situation and prescribed short term solution for the pain and the long term solution for the problem and also a supplement to support the TMJ.
